_meta.description: Tracks which project discovered each knowledge item (skills, patterns, anti-patterns)

itemName.source: string - Project path that discovered this item
itemName.created: string - ISO timestamp when item was created
itemName.contributors: string[] - All projects that used/improved this item
itemName.usageHistory: UsageRecord[] - History of usage across projects
itemName.lastUpdated: string - ISO timestamp of last update
